abstract: Police say former fashion photographer Gabriel Hundiashvili has been arrested in connection with theft of two valuable books from Upper East Side rare-book dealer PRPH Books in spring 2015.

headline.print_headline: Man Is Charged With Stealing Two Rare Books
headline.main: Man Charged With Stealing Rare Books Worth $20,000 From Manhattan Dealer

snippet: Gabriel Hundiashvili, a former fashion photographer, admitted to detectives that he had stolen the two texts, the police said....
lead_paragraph: Gabriel Hundiashvili, a former fashion photographer, admitted to detectives that he had stolen the two texts, the police said.
